Subject: An Introduction to Mondo Zen and the Importance of Meditation
Description: This talk will discuss and explore a modern interpretation of Japanese Rinzai Zen. We will discuss insight and emotional koan practice and the necessity of Zazen (Zen meditation) in daily life. Hosted by Hokyo, a priest of Hollow Bones Zen.  Speakers include:Hokyo Yoi Inu - Track: Life  - Duration: 1 hour
